descriptions: I design and build websites for small to medium-sized businesses.
I’m experienced in JavaScript, ReactJS, NextJS, GatsbyJS, HTML and CSS3, WordPress and SEO.
I fully project manage the project from start to finish.
Regular communication with the client is one of my top priorities.
As an independent sales representative, I started and ran my own LLC selling products for Retriever to merchants.
Developed and presented point-of-sale and processing packages to small and medium businesses.
Installed technology leased by merchant and trained employees on how to use these products.
Planned, organized, and executed routing plan to improve sales efficiency and hit quarterly goals.
Learned, presented, and created sales programs for new technologies launched by the Milwaukee Tool.
Held multiple board positions with trade organizations for Electrical and Utility trades.
Led an internal committees to improve the Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software for sales team.
Focused on the development and implementation of Milwaukee Tool's e-Rebate website/program including:
Identifying and reducing fraud, gaining feedback on UX, and presenting changes to web developers.
Collaborating with web designers and back-end developers to improve the UX of the site.
Designing quarterly assets for the site’s promotions including styling and color design.
